review: When it is working, the Fire TV Stick is awesome (fast connection, unobtrusive) - however consistency is it's downfall. Some days it works like a charm, other days it turns off the TV automatically, or requires restarting it to access certain applications (like SlingTV). These issues seem to be random - same WiFi connection, some hardware, etc
author: A. Fortner

review: Have 2 of them and they work GREAT!! Very happy, exceeded expectations and would recommend to anyone.
